host_about:
Hi, 

I am a part of the global marketplace that exists to solve all your leisure and corporate travel needs by delivering premium and bespoke serviced apartments in Singapore, Hong Kong, Australia and other APAC regions. All the apartments checked through a 100-point checklist to make it the best accommodation for you.  

Not only accommodation, my team can also help you with other services such as Airport pick-up, Breakfast pack*, Meet & Greet service at maximum apartments. 

Book with us and enjoy your future stay !!!

Hosting around 200+ properties, I am a part of the global marketplace that exists to solve all your leisure and corporate travel needs by delivering premium and bespoke serviced apartments in Singapore, Hong Kong, Australia and other APAC regions. All the apartments checked through a 100-point checklist to make it the best accommodation for you.  

Feel confident that you will have a comfortable and a satisfying stay with a clean and welcoming apartment, Keys available at the agreed time, Working internet connection, Prompt & efficient attention to your queries.

My team will also assist you with services like Airport/local transfers, Breakfast pack for selected properties, Meet & Greet service for our maximum apartments. 

Book today and enjoy the stay!!!

Mijn naam is Kim Li Ti Oeij. Ik ben geboren in Nederland en eigenaar van VillaShortStay en momenteel woonachtig in Amsterdam. 
Reizen is mijn passie, waardoor ik al veel van de wereld heb gezien. 

Mijn te huur aangeboden moderne, luxe villa’s heb ik persoonlijk bezocht en geïnspecteerd, zodat ze voldoen aan de Japanse standaard. Dit betekent een hoge standaard van netheid en gastvrijheid. 

Via onderstaande link kun je mijn luxe Airbnb verhuur villa’s o.a. in Bali, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Koh Samui, Hua Hin en Singapore bekijken. 

https://www.airbnb.com/users/800558/listings

De meeste villa’s die ik verhuur kennen een extra service tegen vergoeding, denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan: autoverhuur met chauffeur, spa en massage service, privé chef kok en/of kinderopvang. 

Ik help je graag je een onvergetelijke vakantie te ervaren.

Heb je een persoonlijke wens en/of vraag? Mail me en ik help je graag!

Met vriendelijke groet, 


Kim Li Ti Oeij
Founder VillaShortStay

Hi guys. I have been hosting in New York, New Jersey,  Texas and Hong Kong for a little while now. Most of my clients have been university student medical Residents and new grad young professionals that work in Cubicles.  Over time, this has expanded to a team cater to this kind of clientele.  We call ourselves, Resident Cubes. We help University students and New Grad Young Professionals get into the kind of rooms or apartments that they are looking for,  for the extended stay period they are asking for,  in a great convenient location, normally within their budget or better. Feel free to Feel free to check out our Facebook and website under the same name!
At your service!


RC

Mijn naam is Kim Li Ti Oeij. Ik ben geboren in Nederland en eigenaar van VillaShortStay en momenteel woonachtig in Amsterdam. 
Reizen is mijn passie, waardoor ik al veel van de wereld heb gezien. 

Mijn te huur aangeboden moderne, luxe villa’s heb ik persoonlijk bezocht en geïnspecteerd, zodat ze voldoen aan de Japanse standaard. Dit betekent een hoge standaard van netheid en gastvrijheid. 

Via onderstaande link kun je mijn luxe Airbnb verhuur villa’s o.a. in Bali, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Koh Samui, Hua Hin en Singapore bekijken. 

https://www.airbnb.com/users/800558/listings

De meeste villa’s die ik verhuur kennen een extra service tegen vergoeding, denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan: autoverhuur met chauffeur, spa en massage service, privé chef kok en/of kinderopvang. 

Ik help je graag je een onvergetelijke vakantie te ervaren.

Heb je een persoonlijke wens en/of vraag? Mail me en ik help je graag!

Met vriendelijke groet, 


Kim Li Ti Oeij
Founder VillaShortStay
Nestled in the heart of the vibrant Arab Street enclave is Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Beach Road, Singapore. Enjoy a refreshing stay here with easy access to cultural, business and leisure spots.

Hi, I am Carolyn and I am a retired banker, with 3 grown up boys who are all living overseas. As such I am often travelling, and am happy to open up my house to your family and friends. Please feel free to send me any questions you have before, and during your stay. I hope you enjoy and love my house as much as my boys and I.

M Hotel Singapore is an award-winning hotel centrally located in the heart of Singapore. Whatever may bring you to the buzzing island of Singapore, travelers can easily experience it from the comfort of M Hotel Singapore. As a favorite for global travelers looking to discover the beating heart of the city our prime location is an ideal hub for any stay.

Hotel 1900 @ Chinatown

Located in Chinatown, the hotel provides easy access to various modes of public transportation, a diverse selection of dining options, a vibrant cultural scene, and exciting nightlife. 

Guests can effortlessly explore the city and visit popular attractions. The hotel boasts an array of room types designed to cater to the needs of solo travellers, friends looking for adventure, or couples seeking a romantic getaway.

Hi there! Our names are Jannah and Kathir. We're a fun-loving, adventurous, child-free, and anything goes couple who love to travel. We have known each other for more than 10 years and married for almost 6 years now.

We have been on countless journeys across the world! One of the most memorable one was the Trans-Siberia train ride from Beijing to Moscow. We learnt a lot about each other during that trip and well, the rest is history.  Since then, we try to go to new places every opportunity we get. There's always one memorable story from each of our travels (walked from Tromsø airport to our B&B during winter...) and we hope to be part of yours! We will be more than happy to share our limited experience traveling around the world.

Both of us are gym addicts and ardent football fans (Kathir plays weekly for a team). If we're not watching EPL on weekends we would probably be playing FIFA. We love music as well and have been to a number concerts together. Mostly stuff from the 80s and 90s.

We are also proud pawrents of 3 cavaliers; Troy, Maya, and Cassie.

More about our childfree life: 

https://www.hypeandstuff.com/singaporean-couple-chose-raise-pets-instead-of-children/

So hop on! We're nice and don't bite :D
Nice and cool Respectful Person who Respect All People walks of Life.

Hello! Great to meet you. 
We are a couple currently living in Singapore. And we have two daughters who are studying. 

We are fluent in both English & Chinese and we will be so ever glad to give you tips to get around Singapore. Do feel free to question us anytime! :)
Fun loving woman! HR Consultant by profession.

Hello! I just started running Airbnb on my own after helping my wife (a Superhost) manage her units for the past 3 years. I enjoy helping my guests settle in quickly and comfortably and aim to be helpful as much as I can though I do travel quite a bit. Nature (sea, parks, etc) and sports are my thing and I’ll be most happy to share if you need any ideas to do something fun :)

Hello !
I am Elizabeth from Singapore.

Looking forward to hosting you in our lovely little sunny island.
Enjoy life to the Fullest

Hi everyone ,
 Let me introduce myself to all of you.  I am Avid Traveler, visited many countries for business as well as leisure. Very much interested in culture, tradition, food of places I visit, ever used Airbnb as a guest, likes the concept and feels like there is nothing like to host the other people and share ideas and experiences to those who are visiting my country. I have passion to host,
So I decided to be a host in my own home country, Singapore.
As I strongly feel there is certain chemistry between Host & Guest and one doesn't need to be an Alchemist to understand that all it needs is the passion to host . So welcome to Singapore & be my guest...
PS: My expertise is in short term stays also for additional information about same please visit    website   mresidence .com
Cheers!!!
Bella
Enjoy life to the Fullest
Enjoy holiday

Passionate about all the good things in Singapore and sharing them with you :-)
Only for 90 days or more to abide with Singaporean law.

A creative n artistic guy who loves arts and fashion travels a lot
and much into health and nutrition , maintaining mind and body health
by exercising  regularly and reading up on spiritual and new age updates
Basically a down to earth guy and practical to a nought (on the shy side till i am comfortable with a person to open up) love to share travelling tips, fashion ideas, interiors design, cooking , realities of life issue, health, investment, astrology numerology etc
LIFE MOTTO and things i like : Health Travel  Freedom Family Fashion
 Exercise Friends and Love

Hi My name is Belinda -Housekeeper 

I would like to welcome you to my "Homestay Website" 


Accomodation for: 

- an extended stay for studies, min 3 months
- business,
- training in singapore
 

Room rental are available for min 3month or longer .Room rental depending on the choice of a common sharing room (family suite) ,a standard room,a deluxe room or a triplet room which varies in sizes. We hope to give you a warm home feeling here with sweet dreams. Please forgive us if we cannot meet your  high expectations.We will try our best to make your stay as comfortable as a homestay.

Regards
Belinda

The HANNAH Is The Key To Unlock Your Living Now. We provide flexible rental and unparalleled service of beautifully curated homes, fully-furnished ensuite rooms with co-living and co-working spaces at a prime location with convenient amenities at your doorstep. Rent is all-inclusive of housekeeping, daily breakfast, high-speed wifi and many more. The HANNAH is more than just a place to stay - it is a lifestyle and an experience.

I am British and I have been living in Singapore for most of my life.   I work in football.   I like sports, exercise, yoga, learning languages, food and wine.

My experience in home stay when I traveled in Europe left me a very deep impression. My hosts were very nice and helped me enjoy the
local cultural greatly. I hope to be a good host to my guests too! =D Your comfort and convenience is my top priority. I love traveling and have been more than 40+ countries Eg
Israel, Armenia, Cyprus, London, China,
Philippines etc... Hope to see you soon!
My referral link : https://www.airbnb.com.sg/c/abhishekd8?currency=SGD
Singaporean
Love travel, cooking, Latin dance, and photography.

I'm a Korean living in Singapore. My husband is a Singapore citizen.
We are semi-retired. We love to travel and make new friends.
We hope to make many friends from all over the world.

I live in an international community, and have learned to understand travelers' wants and needs when looking for a place to stay short term or long term, in Singapore or Bali. I'm happy to help you plan the most enjoyable experience for your trip!
It always seems impossible until it’s done.

I enjoy helping my guests settle in quickly and comfortably and aim to be helpful as much as I can though I do travel quite a bit. Nature (sea, parks, etc) and sports are my thing and I’ll be most happy to share if you need any ideas to do something fun :)
I am a professional in Financial Industry and love to host guest at my home.

I am a true-blue Singaporean in my mid 20's with a hearty appetite for life. I love travelling, meeting new people and strongly believe that Singapore is a fantastic place to be, whether be it for work or travel. Having hosted since the early days of Airbnb, I am fairly experienced with this site but continuously endeavor to learn more from the people I come into contact with. Whether you are new to Airbnb and trying out this platform for the very first time, or a seasoned traveler, I hope to make your experience here in Singapore an exceptional one. 

All my apartments are meticulously maintained to a very high standard and each room is professionally cleaned by my dedicated housekeeping team. I am supported by an exceptional group of people and we look forward to making your stay a flawless one. Drop me a message anytime you have a question about Singapore and I’ll do my very best to answer them! 

Safe travels everybody! 

Rebekah Chua

Capsule-style single or double beds in dormitory rooms are offered at Meadows Hostel.. Located near the Jalan Besar Stadium, the hostel is a leisurely 15-minute walk from Lavender MRT Station. Guests can make use of free internet stations, as well as enjoy a simple free breakfast of toast.

Meadows Hostel is within a 20-minute walk from the heritage areas of Kampong Glam and Little India. Farrer Park MRT Station and City Square Mall are a 10-minute walk away. Changi International Airport is a 20-minute taxi ride from the hostel.

Fitted with air conditioning, all dormitory rooms come with personal lockers. Bathroom facilities are shared and are equipped with a shower.

We also have 24 reception services

Free Breakfast and Wi-Fi is available in the common areas. There is a shared kitchen with a microwave, toaster and fridge which guests can make use of. Laundry services are also available. 

Lavender is a great choice for travelers interested in universal studios, convenient public transportation and city trips.

This property is also rated for the best value in Singapore! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

We speak your language!

Hi, I'm Augustus and I work in social media :-)

A bit too everything for my own good. I've made a lifestyle out of having one too many balls up in the air - not the warm kind. No concussions so far, at least that I can remember. 

NOTE: I guess it was bound to happen at some point: ended up meeting a disgruntled host in NY last year that put me in a scary situation. Long story short: Airbnb awarded in my favour and put me up in a nice hotel on their dime - managed to dig up a record of public complaints with the local government that the tenants had filed due to poor maintenance. Thank goodness for public records, and I hope that will be the last time I need to do a search!

Addicted to books - I churn through them like a coke fiend in Vegas. The authors would be none too happy. 

Documentaries over war films. Comedies over rom-com's. 

Also, I like Ikea. That's pretty random, but I'm an inveterate hacker/designer so Ikea's a sort of graveyard of parts for new projects.

Interests:
Guilty pleasures - Obscure/esoteric documentaries, reality TV (people are stranger than fiction), techno-babble (philosophy)

Architecture/design - I could stare at architecture all day. Even bad architecture holds some perverse thrill.

Board games - Settlers of Cataan (my new fave), Monopoly (studied the minutae of this game)

New media - Blinking lights, videos, gamification, computer-mediated communication, digitized food, social food, social networks

Art, culture, tech, startups, fashion, writing, dance, yoga

Philosophy:
In work, I've taken the road less travelled. I'm lucky enough to have the opportunity to tackle problems without precedents.

In life, I travel for people and architecture. Design comes in a close third.

I've made a profession of describing the visual in plain English for over 6 years, but watching the sun rise behind Angkor Wat is as close as I've gotten to speechlessness.

I hold the belief that I can get along with anyone if I'm willing to see things from their side.

Music, Movies, Books:
Tough - very tough

Books - Travel literature (I mean Biddlecombe and Potts, not Lonely Planet!), PJ O'Rourke (the early stuff), David Sedaris (I have a soft spot for a good wit)

Films - Indie romantic comedies, ensemble casts, foreign films, pseudo-philosophical horror, pseudo-philosophical sci-fi, documentaries about anything

Hi I'm Lin. Anthropologist, behavioural + experience designer, and entrepreneur. 

I love walking and discovering new neighbourhoods and cosy places, cooking, making things, and making things better. I also love playing and learning new tech, reading, and watching sci-fi. Solaris, Rick and Morty, Ursula K Le Guin. 

I co-founded a school that teaches kids how to create with technology and design. Then I co-founded a fabrication cafe at the ArtScience Museum in Singapore, an online art gallery x interdisciplinary art - tech publication, a database for architects to choose sustainable materials. Now I’m a researcher and consultant for public problems.  

I’ve been quite lucky to meet some beautiful minds — explorers and travellers as we are. I love meeting new people, everyone tells their own stories. 

When I travel I like to see some nature, art, quaint corners and neighbourhoods. That last bit describes my home, a calm apartment nestled in a heritage neighbourhood, east of Singapore.

All lovingly restored or beautifully redesigned as I'm quite an artistic and creative person and wanting to try new ideas and to reduce, reuse and recycle or a newly coined term Upcycle:

Loads of free time on my hands, weekdays 9-5 so can show u around my lovely country

Mijn naam is Kim Li Ti Oeij. Ik ben geboren in Nederland en eigenaar van VillaShortStay en momenteel woonachtig in Amsterdam. 
Reizen is mijn passie, waardoor ik al veel van de wereld heb gezien. 

Mijn te huur aangeboden moderne, luxe villa’s heb ik persoonlijk bezocht en geïnspecteerd, zodat ze voldoen aan de Japanse standaard. Dit betekent een hoge standaard van netheid en gastvrijheid. 

Via onderstaande link kun je mijn luxe Airbnb verhuur villa’s o.a. in Bali, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Koh Samui, Hua Hin en Singapore bekijken. 

https://www.airbnb.com/users/800558/listings

De meeste villa’s die ik verhuur kennen een extra service tegen vergoeding, denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan: autoverhuur met chauffeur, spa en massage service, privé chef kok en/of kinderopvang. 

Ik help je graag je een onvergetelijke vakantie te ervaren.

Heb je een persoonlijke wens en/of vraag? Mail me en ik help je graag!

Met vriendelijke groet, 


Kim Li Ti Oeij
Founder VillaShortStay

Via onderstaande link kun je mijn luxe Airbnb verhuur villa’s o.a. in Bali, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Koh Samui, Hua Hin en Singapore bekijken. 

https://www.airbnb.com/users/800558/listings

De meeste villa’s die ik verhuur kennen een extra service tegen vergoeding, denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan: autoverhuur met chauffeur, spa en massage service, privé chef kok en/of kinderopvang. 

Ik help je graag je een onvergetelijke vakantie te ervaren.

Heb je een persoonlijke wens en/of vraag? Mail me en ik help je graag!

Met vriendelijke groet, 


Kim Li Ti Oeij

Hi,  I used to be an ex-banker, but am now working from home. I love travelling, diving and photography. Most of my travels involved the great outdoors. I love nature and the tranquillity it brings for my soul. Some of my most memorable travels include WWII ship wreck dives at Phillipines and 3 weeks self drive in New Zealand.
I also love interior decoration and seek the aesthetics. The house you'll be staying with me is inherited from my parents. My place is uniquely decorated with Chinese neoclassical style collection, the guest room is designed for the traditional Japanese floor futon and the peaceful forest green outside the window is therapeutic and healing for the soul.
I'm a young and dynamic person! I always make sure to give my best to make guest's stay pleasant and comfortable.

Semi retired professional in finance sector. 

Settled down on the quieter East side to enjoy the sun, sand and sea. 

Now renting my dual-key apartments in the heart of financial district. 

Also another dual-key duplex shophouse SOHO and another hip apartment at the city fringe, belonging to my mother. 

All lovingly restored or beautifully redesigned as I'm quite an artistic and creative person and wanting to try new ideas and to reduce, reuse and recycle or a newly coined term Upcycle: 

To make old things and materials into new uses and be aesthetically appealing, like old sewing machines to be the base / legs of dining tables and bathroom vanity. Even an old wall was redesigned into a bar counter!!!

Loads of free time on my hands, weekdays 9-5 so can show u around my lovely country

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse 
Kay

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse

Mijn naam is Kim Li Ti Oeij. Ik ben geboren in Nederland en eigenaar van VillaShortStay en momenteel woonachtig in Amsterdam. 
Reizen is mijn passie, waardoor ik al veel van de wereld heb gezien. 

Mijn te huur aangeboden moderne, luxe villa’s heb ik persoonlijk bezocht en geïnspecteerd, zodat ze voldoen aan de Japanse standaard. Dit betekent een hoge standaard van netheid en gastvrijheid. 

Via onderstaande link kun je mijn luxe Airbnb verhuur villa’s o.a. in Bali, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Koh Samui, Hua Hin en Singapore bekijken. 

https://www.airbnb.com/users/800558/listings

De meeste villa’s die ik verhuur kennen een extra service tegen vergoeding, denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan: autoverhuur met chauffeur, spa en massage service, privé chef kok en/of kinderopvang. 

Ik help je graag je een onvergetelijke vakantie te ervaren.

Heb je een persoonlijke wens en/of vraag? Mail me en ik help je graag!

Met vriendelijke groet, 


Kim Li Ti Oeij
Founder VillaShortStay

Capsule-style single or double beds in dormitory rooms are offered at Meadows Hostel.. Located near the Jalan Besar Stadium, the hostel is a leisurely 15-minute walk from Lavender MRT Station. Guests can make use of free internet stations, as well as enjoy a simple free breakfast of toast.

Meadows Hostel is within a 20-minute walk from the heritage areas of Kampong Glam and Little India. Farrer Park MRT Station and City Square Mall are a 10-minute walk away. Changi International Airport is a 20-minute taxi ride from the hostel.

Fitted with air conditioning, all dormitory rooms come with personal lockers. Bathroom facilities are shared and are equipped with a shower.

We also have 24 reception services

Free Breakfast and Wi-Fi is available in the common areas. There is a shared kitchen with a microwave, toaster and fridge which guests can make use of. Laundry services are also available. 

Lavender is a great choice for travelers interested in universal studios, convenient public transportation and city trips.

This property is also rated for the best value in Singapore! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

We speak your language!

Travellers should check the current restrictions and conditions associated with travel to Singapore.

Eligible Age for Check-In
You must be at least 18 years of age to check-in and register for a room.
The Hotel do not accept children below the age of 12 years old, each teenage guest below 18 years old will need to be accompanied by at least one adult.

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse

A green oasis amidst Singapore's concrete jungle, Habyt Cantonment (Formerly Hmlet) is the lifestyle retreat you've been looking for. Primed for both work and play, our chic residence features 145 designed rooms, a plunge pool, communal kitchens, laundrette, co-working spaces and a canteen with honesty bar and lounge area. You can walk to 2 nearest MRT train station, or take 10min travelling to tourist attractions like Orchard, MBS and Sentosa.

Habyt is the largest flexible housing company globally, offering private and shared apartments across 25+ cities worldwide. Our mission is to provide access to housing anywhere, for everyone. 

All our homes are move-in ready with easy access to public transport and communal facilities to provide them with everything they might need to experience the ultimate hassle-free living.

Travelling opens a new horizon of fun and knowledge that leaves me invigorated, inspired and empowered. I hope it does for you too!

Our apartments are situated along Queen Street in Singapore's Central Business District and offers great views of the city. A short 3-5 minutes walk takes you to Bras Basah, Bencoolen, Bugis and Cityhall MRT Station. Major local attractions such as Esplanade, Merlion Park, Fort Canning, National Museum and the Marina Bay are within walking distance. Surrounded by shopping malls, dining outlets and all the convenience you need while in Singapore, my place would be perfect for any business or leisure travelers. 

Each apartment has a king-sized bed, kitchenette, bathtub with shower and a Sharp Plasmacluster Ionizer which eliminates most airborne viruses. With a team of dedicated and experienced service professionals offering 24-hour concierge and surveillance and housekeeping services, residents and guests can naturally be assured of exceptional support throughout your stay.

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :)

Semi retired professional in finance sector. 

Settled down on the quieter East side to enjoy the sun, sand and sea. 

Now renting my dual-key apartments in the heart of financial district. 

Also another dual-key duplex shophouse SOHO and another hip apartment at the city fringe, belonging to my mother. 

All lovingly restored or beautifully redesigned as I'm quite an artistic and creative person and wanting to try new ideas and to reduce, reuse and recycle or a newly coined term Upcycle: 

To make old things and materials into new uses and be aesthetically appealing, like old sewing machines to be the base / legs of dining tables and bathroom vanity. Even an old wall was redesigned into a bar counter!!!

Loads of free time on my hands, weekdays 9-5 so can show u around my lovely country

Travelling opens a new horizon of fun and knowledge that leaves me invigorated, inspired and empowered. I hope it does for you too!

Our apartments are situated along Queen Street in Singapore's Central Business District and offers great views of the city. A short 3-5 minutes walk takes you to Bras Basah, Bencoolen, Bugis and Cityhall MRT Station. Major local attractions such as Esplanade, Merlion Park, Fort Canning, National Museum and the Marina Bay are within walking distance. Surrounded by shopping malls, dining outlets and all the convenience you need while in Singapore, my place would be perfect for any business or leisure travelers. 

Each apartment has a king-sized bed, kitchenette, bathtub with shower and a Sharp Plasmacluster Ionizer which eliminates most airborne viruses. With a team of dedicated and experienced service professionals offering 24-hour concierge and surveillance and housekeeping services, residents and guests can naturally be assured of exceptional support throughout your stay.

Mijn naam is Kim Li Ti Oeij. Ik ben geboren in Nederland en eigenaar van VillaShortStay en momenteel woonachtig in Amsterdam. 
Reizen is mijn passie, waardoor ik al veel van de wereld heb gezien. 

Mijn te huur aangeboden moderne, luxe villa’s heb ik persoonlijk bezocht en geïnspecteerd, zodat ze voldoen aan de Japanse standaard. Dit betekent een hoge standaard van netheid en gastvrijheid. 

Via onderstaande link kun je mijn luxe Airbnb verhuur villa’s o.a. in Bali, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Koh Samui, Hua Hin en Singapore bekijken. 

https://www.airbnb.com/users/800558/listings

De meeste villa’s die ik verhuur kennen een extra service tegen vergoeding, denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan: autoverhuur met chauffeur, spa en massage service, privé chef kok en/of kinderopvang. 

Ik help je graag je een onvergetelijke vakantie te ervaren.

Heb je een persoonlijke wens en/of vraag? Mail me en ik help je graag!

Met vriendelijke groet, 


Kim Li Ti Oeij

Semi retired professional in finance sector. 

Settled down on the quieter East side to enjoy the sun, sand and sea. 

Now renting my dual-key apartments in the heart of financial district. 

Also another dual-key duplex shophouse SOHO and another hip apartment at the city fringe, belonging to my mother. 

All lovingly restored or beautifully redesigned as I'm quite an artistic and creative person and wanting to try new ideas and to reduce, reuse and recycle or a newly coined term Upcycle:

Loads of free time on my hands, weekdays 9-5 so can show u around my lovely country

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :)

Semi retired professional in finance sector. 

Settled down on the quieter East side to enjoy the sun, sand and sea. 

Now renting my dual-key apartments in the heart of financial district. 

Also another dual-key duplex shophouse SOHO and another hip apartment at the city fringe, belonging to my mother. 

All lovingly restored or beautifully redesigned as I'm quite an artistic and creative person and wanting to try new ideas and to reduce, reuse and recycle or a newly coined term Upcycle: 

To make old things and materials into new uses and be aesthetically appealing, like old sewing machines to be the base / legs of dining tables and bathroom vanity. Even an old wall was redesigned into a bar counter!!!

Loads of free time on my hands, weekdays 9-5 so can show u around my lovely country

Travelling opens a new horizon of fun and knowledge that leaves me invigorated, inspired and empowered. I hope it does for you too!

Our apartments are situated along Queen Street in Singapore's Central Business District and offers great views of the city. A short 3-5 minutes walk takes you to Bras Basah, Bencoolen, Bugis and Cityhall MRT Station. Major local attractions such as Esplanade, Merlion Park, Fort Canning, National Museum and the Marina Bay are within walking distance. Surrounded by shopping malls, dining outlets and all the convenience you need while in Singapore, my place would be perfect for any business or leisure travelers. 

Each apartment has a king-sized bed, kitchenette, bathtub with shower and a Sharp Plasmacluster Ionizer which eliminates most airborne viruses. With a team of dedicated and experienced service professionals offering 24-hour concierge and surveillance and housekeeping services, residents and guests can naturally be assured of exceptional support throughout your stay.

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse 
Kay

River City Inn is a family-owned and operated hostel. 

We are located right in the heart of the Singapore city and are within walking distance from several attractions:
- located directly opp Clarke Quay Train Station (1-2min walk)
- Walking distance to Singapore River, Boat Quay, Merlion Park, Esplanade, Chinatown, Fort Canning Park, St Andrew's Cathedral, Old Raffles Hotel, Raffles City, Ann Siang Hill, Buddha Tooth Relic Temple, Sri Mariamman Temple, Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay
 - Eating places close by Song Fa Bak Kut Teh, Yakun Kaya Toast, Central Shopping Mall, Chinatown complex, Chinatown Food Street, Chinatown Point Shopping Mall (with NTUC local supermarket), Jumbo Crab Restaurant, Lau Pat Sat, Bars and Restaurants along Singapore River

We provide:
- Free Wi-Fi, clean Sheets, air-conditioning, lockers with lock, free-flow water all day
- towel rental and laundry service available

Hello there! I’m Celin, and welcome to Singapore! :) It is always a joy for me to meet new people, and I look forward to hosting you and making your stay in Singapore memorable! Feel free to reach out with any questions or booking inquiries.

I am semi retired and I love hosting. I wish to let out some rooms and get to know more people from various countries. I am a nature lover and love gardening. I exercise regularly and do meditation. I maintain my place well and cleanliness is my motto. I travel regularly and enjoy learning different culture and making new friends. Currently, my son, Edwin is also co-hosting with me. River City Inn is a family-owned and operated hostel. 

We are located right in the heart of the Singapore city and are within walking distance from several attractions:
- located directly opp Clarke Quay Train Station (1-2min walk)
- Walking distance to Singapore River, Boat Quay, Merlion Park, Esplanade, Chinatown, Fort Canning Park, St Andrew's Cathedral, Old Raffles Hotel, Raffles City, Ann Siang Hill, Buddha Tooth Relic Temple, Sri Mariamman Temple, Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay
 - Eating places close by Song Fa Bak Kut Teh, Yakun Kaya Toast, Central Shopping Mall, Chinatown complex, Chinatown Food Street, Chinatown Point Shopping Mall (with NTUC local supermarket), Jumbo Crab Restaurant, Lau Pat Sat, Bars and Restaurants along Singapore River

We provide:
- Free Wi-Fi, clean Sheets, air-conditioning, lockers with lock, free-flow water all day
- towel rental and laundry service available

Staying with us is not for everyone. If you enjoy visiting the touristy places, googling "top 10 destinations in Singapore", then it would be better to find somewhere else. 

But, if you like to explore the nooks and crannies in Singapore, and visit eateries locals frequent, then you have come to the right place!

Whether you are in Singapore for Business or Holiday, I will show you my hidden eating spots, the places that tripadvisor hasn't discovered. The places to visit that few travellers know of. Plus, everything locals know that you cannot find online.

If you think staying with us is right for you, drop me a message:)
Hi I am the owner of this unit, just feel free to contact me if you have any request/questions about this unit, Thanks :)

Decan and I are travel buffs. We visited more than 50 countries and lived in London for a few years. I love to travel , play the keyboard, and sing as well as going to church. I  keep myself fit with activities like zumba ,hip hop and weightlifting classes.I am living with my adult son and husband. 
I am a house proud person  and therefore my home is stylishly decorated and always neat and tidy.
My wife & I will always go the extra mile to make sure your stay with us is amazing! Born & raised in Singapore, we know the best spots around the city!

I am a true-blue Singaporean in my mid 20's with a hearty appetite for life. I love travelling, meeting new people and strongly believe that Singapore is a fantastic place to be, whether be it for work or travel. Having hosted since the early days of Airbnb, I am fairly experienced with this site but continuously endeavor to learn more from the people I come into contact with. All my apartments are meticulously maintained to a very high standard and each room is professionally cleaned by my dedicated housekeeping team. Safe travels everybody!

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse 
Kay

Dear Guests,

I am a teacher. I love to travel and over the years I have visited the continents. I find Prague in Eastern Europe most charming and Wanaka in New Zealand most idyllic. Being a host is an extension of my love to travel. I get to know people from different countries. Over the years, I have guests who have become my friends. My guest rooms are available to only one guest at a time.

We (Gesan and Sharm) are married and together with an active inquisitive son (Gautham) enjoy meeting people from around the world.  We love to meet visitors to Singapore; and to share about life in and the history of Singapore from the perspective of a local Singaporean family.
We're Indian by race; born and brought up in Singapore and Malaysia.  We've travelled alone and together to many parts of the world.  Happy to share our experiences and suggestions of must-sees in Asia.
Who are we?
Gesan is an editor by profession; lawyer and philosopher in the making with a point of view on most subjects.  Sharm works from home and travels occasionally to work with professionals on their business presentations.  Gautham is an active, chatty 14 year old with a cupboard full of board games and books, waiting for friends from around the world to play with.
We enjoy hosting families, love the sound of children's voices in our home and having an extended family when guests stay with us.
Frequent travellers

Dear Guests,

I am a teacher. I love to travel and over the years I have visited the continents. I find Prague in Eastern Europe most charming and Wanaka in New Zealand most idyllic. Being a host is an extension of my love to travel. I get to know people from different countries. Over the years, I have guests who have become my friends. My guest rooms are available to only one guest at a time.
I m a bubbly person that is houseproud n enjoy good homecooked meal. I am particular about hygiene and I am terribly allergic to smell especially from cigarettes and dust.

An avid traveler who loves meeting new people, I have made many friends along my journeys from all cultures and walks of life. Always on the lookout for new challenges and experiences!

Looking for ideas and advice about my travels? Check out my website theguidemaster!

Interests: entrepreneurship, local travelling, reading, layman art, layman philosophy, home furnishing, adventures, peace, a good Manhattan 

Travel wishlist: Latin America, Eastern Europe (someday I will...)

I am a true-blue Singaporean in my mid 20's with a hearty appetite for life. I love travelling, meeting new people and strongly believe that Singapore is a fantastic place to be, whether be it for work or travel. Having hosted since the early days of Airbnb, I am fairly experienced with this site but continuously endeavor to learn more from the people I come into contact with. All my apartments are meticulously maintained to a very high standard and each room is professionally cleaned by my dedicated housekeeping team. I am supported by an exceptional group of people and we look forward to making your stay a flawless one. Drop me a message anytime you have a question about Singapore and I’ll do my very best to answer them! 

Safe travels everybody! 

Rebekah Chua

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse

Capsule-style single or double beds in dormitory rooms are offered at Meadows Hostel.. Located near the Jalan Besar Stadium, the hostel is a leisurely 15-minute walk from Lavender MRT Station. Guests can make use of free internet stations, as well as enjoy a simple free breakfast of toast.

Meadows Hostel is within a 20-minute walk from the heritage areas of Kampong Glam and Little India. Farrer Park MRT Station and City Square Mall are a 10-minute walk away. Changi International Airport is a 20-minute taxi ride from the hostel.

Fitted with air conditioning, all dormitory rooms come with personal lockers. Bathroom facilities are shared and are equipped with a shower.

We also have 24 reception services

Free Breakfast and Wi-Fi is available in the common areas. There is a shared kitchen with a microwave, toaster and fridge which guests can make use of. Laundry services are also available. 

Lavender is a great choice for travelers interested in universal studios, convenient public transportation and city trips.

This property is also rated for the best value in Singapore! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

We speak your language!

I am a retiree living with my wife Jane. We bought this house and converted it to a two-storey dwelling in 2001 when our 4 children were still schooling. Now that they are all married and flown the nest, the house with 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms seems too big and empty for us and we would like to share 3 of our bedrooms. In my spare time I paint, whereas my wife likes socializing with people in general. We like travelling and spend much of our time with our children and grand children. We also strongly believe in giving back to society, to make a difference (in any way) to improve the lives of the underprivileged.

I love to eat, cook and bake since I was from this island famed for food, Penang. During my weekends, I venture out to try new cafes and eating spots. I've traveled quite a bit mostly around Asia and enjoy meeting new people. I prefer the road less taken, wandering around the streets because the journey is more important than the destination. My yearly resolution is to travel to a country that I've not been to before.

Hello there! Welcome to my listing page. I live in the apartment. My home is well curated, inspired by modern and chic design. Coming from a travel enthusiast, the only thing I asked for is my guests to enjoy their stay in my tidy & comfortable home (and leave it just as tidy and comfortable for my next guest!) 

We will meet on check in and check out if I am home. I will be very happy to help you if it is within my means and tell you what to do in this beautiful city! I regularly travel around the world and usually stay in Airbnb so I understand travellers’ needs :-).

Semi retired professional in finance sector. 

Settled down on the quieter East side to enjoy the sun, sand and sea. 

Now renting my dual-key apartments in the heart of financial district. 

Also another dual-key duplex shophouse SOHO and another hip apartment at the city fringe, belonging to my mother. 

All lovingly restored or beautifully redesigned as I'm quite an artistic and creative person and wanting to try new ideas and to reduce, reuse and recycle or a newly coined term Upcycle: 

To make old things and materials into new uses and be aesthetically appealing, like old sewing machines to be the base / legs of dining tables and bathroom vanity. Even an old wall was redesigned into a bar counter!!!

Loads of free time on my hands, weekdays 9-5 so can show u around my lovely country

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :)

Enjoyed saving, refurbishing  and re-developing one of Singapore's heritage shophouses so much, decided to go one step further. Refurbishing another 2 shophouses nearby which includes 3 suites and an eclectic modern British restaurant - Rabbit Carrot Gun - and gastro bar - The Trenchard Arms. Hi I'm Marc. We have such dedicated, friendly and hardworking team at Citadines Fusionopolis Singapore and we certainly look forward to host you and we shall do our very best to make you feel at home.  

Citadines Fusionopolis Singapore is part of the 30-hectare Fusionopolis precinct in the one-north development, well served by food & beverage outlets and retail amenities, including a supermarket, medical centre, pharmacies and post office. With the "one-north" Mass Rapid Transit Station just a stone’s throw away, it only takes a convenient 30-minute ride to reach the Central Business District and a five-minute ride to visit CapitaLand’s Star Vista shopping mall, Singapore's first naturally cooled mall with a wide variety of shopping and dining options as well as a performing arts centre. We are easily accessible to attractions such as Science Centre, Haw Par Villa theme park, Chinese Garden as well as a popular dining spot, Holland Village. It is also close to the National University of Singapore, National University Hospital and Singapore Polytechnic.

A retreat for savvy independent travelers on extended stay, the serviced residence offers a range of spacious one-bedroom loft units, featuring chic interiors with high ceilings, separate living and dining area, kitchen and bedroom. Guests can choose from a selection of services to customize their stay, and enjoy relaxing at the sky terrace, residents’ lounge and sweat out at our outdoor fitness corner.

Location:

Citadines Fusionopolis Singapore
3 Fusionopolis Way
Symbiosis Tower 
Singapore 138633

Hi! My name is Peir, I am from Singapore. I have been living in Spain in my van since 2021 travelling around working remotely and climbing. I’d also studied and lived in London for 12 years. I am a menswear designer by training. I love art and design, tinkering / building things (ideas, businesses, stuff!) and climbing.

A gleaming metropolis known to be a melting pot of cultures, Singapore makes for a unique travel destination. Skyscrapers live harmoniously among heritage buildings that date as far back as the early 1900s, whose architectural styles tell tales of the city’s colonial past.

Known as ‘The Garden City’ for its constant stream of manicured tree-lined streets and bushes dotted with bright flowers, Singapore is an unexpected wonderland for fans of all things green. It is in this beautiful landscape of concrete and nature that the Somerset Bencoolen Singapore is located.

A variety of museums and temples sit just a short 5- to 10-minute walk away from the Somerset residence. Visit Little India where colourful temples and a smorgasbord of spicy, sweet culinary treats can be found, and later, the National Gallery or Singapore Art Museum, where travellers and locals alike walk among Southeast Asian artwork.

Within a 10-minute drive away is Mustafa Shopping Centre, a 24-hour shopping mall located at the edge of Little India that is dedicated to stocking everything from spices to gold, electronic products to basketball shoes. Another shopping haven of quite a different scale is Orchard Road, where a slew of shopping malls decked with high street and designed labels are rolled out, which is just two train stops away from the close-by Dhoby Ghaut train station.

For food, guests will be spoilt for choice at the range of culinary offerings available in the vicinity, from incredible brunch fare to quaint cafés dotting the area. But worth travelling for is the nationwide favourite chilli crab, which is steamed crabs tossed in a sticky, sweet, mildly spicy sauce found mostly in the East, along with Lagoon Food Village, where a diverse range of food stalls reside. Here, visitors can find a heady mix of flavours and dishes inspired by Chinese, Malay and Indian cuisines.

After a long day of exploring, retire to Somerset Bencoolen Singapore to refresh yourself. Guests can choose from a range of apartment types, from 1-bedroom to 2-bedroom apartments.

Guests are also given full access to a comprehensive list of amenities available in-house such as the fully equipped gymnasium, outdoor swimming pool and children's wading pool, an outdoor garden, residents' lounge and a business centre services.

Hi, I'm Martin and My Team and I can't wait to welcome you to D'HOTEL Singapore. We offer our guest complimentary WiFi and housekeeping services.

D’Hotel is set in the midst of Tiong Bahru, a historic neighbourhood that was built in the 1930s. In recent years, it has undergone gentrification, resulting in the opening of a slew of chic cafes, art galleries and stores with easy access to Tiong Bahru, Outram Park and Chinatown MRT Stations in the vicinity. 

D’Hotel offers 41 well-appointed rooms which are spacious, stylish and punctuated with bursts of floral and nature-inspired artwork. The property also has a fitness corner to cater to your fitness needs and a rooftop bar that offers a panoramic view of the city skyline. 

Tiong Bahru was listed by Vogue magazine as among the hippiest neighbourhoods in the world. It is made up of 30 apartment blocks, housing over 900 units with a Streamline Moderne style of architecture, where D’hotel Singapore stands out amongst the Tiong Bahru hotel apartment complexes. Among its charms are the Bird Corner, wet market, Monkey God Temple and last remaining pre-war civilian air raid shelter still in existence today. Explore these and more through the Tiong Bahru Trail (curated by the National Heritage Board) which meanders through the estate, and ends at the hawker centre where delectable street food awaits. A stone’s throw away is river-side lifestyle hubs Robertson Quay and Clarke Quay, as well as Chinatown. Orchard Road and the Central Business District are also a short drive away.

Hi I'm Lin. Anthropologist, behavioural + experience designer, and entrepreneur. 

I love walking and discovering new neighbourhoods and cosy places, cooking, making things, and making things better. I also love playing and learning new tech, reading, and watching sci-fi. Solaris, Rick and Morty, Ursula K Le Guin. 

I co-founded a school that teaches kids how to create with technology and design. Then I co-founded a fabrication cafe at the ArtScience Museum in Singapore, an online art gallery x interdisciplinary art - tech publication, a database for architects to choose sustainable materials. Now I’m a researcher and consultant for public problems.  

I’ve been quite lucky to meet some beautiful minds — explorers and travellers as we are. I love meeting new people, everyone tells their own stories. 

When I travel I like to see some nature, art, quaint corners and neighbourhoods. That last bit describes my home, a calm apartment nestled in a heritage neighbourhood, east of Singapore.

Travel is in my blood. I love being in unfamiliar places and finding my way, that gets my adrenaline pumping. I have a deep appreciation for different cultures and respect people all over the world. I miss my boys (two westies dogs) the most when I travel. I love all animals and believe that human and animals should co-exist harmoniously. That is also why I choose to be vegetarian. I hope one day we can have an world of Utopia. I left a corporate job of 16 years to pursue my dreams in design. I now build my own label of bags. It is a wild contrast of what I used to do but again, it is this unfamiliarity and challenges that drives me. Everything in life is an adventure. It is all about perspective. I love hiking, photography, sunset and sunrise. Life is beautiful.
Amateur Traveller

I am Jay and really enjoy being a member of the Airbnb community. I have hosted no less than 200 guests and I have learnt alot from each and every one of them. I take pride in being an Airbnb Superhost. I am a social entrepreneur and I enjoy traveling. In life, I learnt that trust is the fundamental condition for all communications. And this is the reason why I think the trust formed in the Airbnb community is a very special thing that is hard to come by. I hope I can continue to be a member to perpetuate trust and to make the world a better place for exploration and self discovery.
I am a student of business administration at Bangkok University. I like sport, swimming and dancing.

A simple wife and mother of 3 children; an entrepreneur working in a family-owned business. Love to meet different kinds of people with various backgrounds. Interactive and genial person.

Bi-lingual Singaporean; Very fluent in English, Fluent in Mandarin (Chinese), intermediate in Taiwanese Chinese language,  and a Beginner in French.  I am a weekend cook, trained in french culinary art.
Live in Singapore, 39 yrs old architect and yoga teacher, love peace and quiet and the outdoors!

Studio M - Singapore's first fully loft-inspired designer hotel
Studio M Hotel is rated as one of the best hotels in Singapore. It's also Singapore's first fully loft-inspired designer hotel. What does that mean? It means that we’re big on style, and understand that it’s kind of cool to stay in a space that feels like a contemporary stylish urban living.

As a lifestyle boutique hotel in Robertson Quay, M Social Hotel Singapore captures the spirit of adventure behind every stay. Akin to a theatrical experience, M Social Hotel Singapore is a stage where we tell a unique story with a well-designed setting and ambiance. The chic loft and alcove interiors designed by famous French visionary Philippe Starck add to the theatricality and sense of intrigue to our hotel.

M Hotel Singapore is an award-winning hotel centrally located in the heart of Singapore. Whatever may bring you to the buzzing island of Singapore, travelers can easily experience it from the comfort of M Hotel Singapore. As a favorite for global travelers looking to discover the beating heart of the city our prime location is an ideal hub for any stay.

Luxury & Eco Friendly Hotel in Singapore
Our serene, award-winning river-side hotel is tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the city; an ideal one-stop-shop for travelers of all kinds. A picturesque waterfront location that calms but near the bustling Clarke Quay offers both business or leisure travelers amenities and facilities that cater to every need.

K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :)

Hello! I’m Amara Sanctuary Sentosa, your peaceful spot on Singapore’s southern island. Once a British military outpost, the property is a heritage colonial-style building that offers luxury amidst tranquil grounds. Enjoy views of the South China Sea from our rooms and easy access to Sentosa’s attractions. Whether you’re here to stay with us, unwind at our spa, or simply share a meal, I look forward to welcoming you.
